title: One Day After School
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Ahh... This quiet time is nice, isn’t it? I’m gonna make some good progress in my reading.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>A lively clubroom is nice, but a quiet one is nice too, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Kanata, could you get me some tea?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Sure thing~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Thanks.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan’s getting sleepy now~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Go ahead and sleep. Just tell me when to wake you up. And make sure you use this blanket so you don’t catch a cold.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Thank yooou~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>What time should I wake you up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>At 4:30, please... Yawn...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
